name: Summer Salad
keywords: cucumber, fresh herbs, onion, low calorie, summer
recipeIngredient: 3 cucumbers (about 2 1/2 pounds), peeled, seeded and sliced thin (about 5 1/2 cups)
2 onions (12 ounces), peeled and sliced thin (2 1/2 cups)
1/2 to 1 tablespoon Tabasco sauce, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl. Mix well, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, but ideally 2 to 3 hours (to a maximum of 8 hours).
